name: ONSLAUGHT (itch) (Baggs)
description:
CONTROLS :

W / S : Move forward / backward
A / D : Rotate left / right
Q / E : Strafe left / right
Space Bar : Use Ship's skill

A small Vampire Survivors-inspired project, made in a few weeks on my free time. I worked with a close friend of mine (https://www.instagram.com/jipegraphi/) who made all of the 2D assets while I worked on everything else, from gameplay to VFX. This was also an occasion to try the 2D functionalities of Unreal Engine.
